vdb.name: twitter
vdb.description: Shows how to call Web Services
vdb.model: select tweet.* from (call twitter.invokeHTTP(endpoint=>'https://api.twitter.com/1.1/statuses/user_timeline.json', action=>'GET')) w, XMLTABLE('/myxml/myxml' passing JSONTOXML('myxml', w.result) columns created_on string PATH 'created_at', source string PATH 'source', text string PATH 'text') tweet;
